data.text:
Instytut Polski w Nowym JorkuStreaming on MUBI starting September 12, 2021The Polish Cultural Institute New York’s audiences can watch the series with a 30 days free trial (instead of the regular 7 days) by clicking this link: MUBI Polish Cultural Institute New York is excited to partner with MUBI to celebrate Stanislaw Lem’s centennial.
